channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @BenYehudaPress @AdneSadeh Not necessarily the case that he’s quoting one of this timeline’s Talmuds.
“We are just $28 away from the $9000 mark,” he tweeted, and he was flooded by ancient memories of public television pledge drives. https://t.co/cuclvzb1z7
@trayne_wreck Definitely the summer dinosaur blockbuster we needed.
No wonder God wants a starship. https://t.co/WdqVF2vCTL
@DavidRSelis @theULSpecColl The Genizah version is classic, but it really deserves an ArtScroll-style revisionist commentary.

Remember: Republicans don't have to worry about the real life consequences of their laws because they are either (1) pathological criminals (like the indicted Texas attorney general) or (2) pathological religious fanatics who trust God to make good on all earthly suffering. https://t.co/9Cocm30tEF
Or at least all the earthly suffering of the believers. With the rest facing eternal sadistic torment at the hand of the sadistic god they fashioned in their own sadistic image.
As someone who believes that North Jersey should get all the Senate seats, it hurts me to admit how true this thread is. https://t.co/mwAZUTaDvl

It’s not often I find a review of SF on this account. Worth your time. https://t.co/ODmZwOWNOq
@Lexaphus might find this interesting.
Your reminder that amping your the bloodshed is a good way to build support for fascist solutions. As the Republicans promoting gun murders know well. https://t.co/38m6bFewSH
Hoping this thread is going to look at the ties the Republican candidate for Pennsylvania governor seems to have with one of Rev. Moon’s more interesting sons. https://t.co/bCB67mok0n
@JeffSharlet Note that most Democrats are carefully avoiding the word “abortion” in their emails declaring their loud support for “women’s rights to bodily autonomy.”

No, let’s talk about Catholic extremists playing Calvinball. Because that’s the real game. https://t.co/Xhg0JmK9l7
See here for details. https://t.co/kYr5IRIKGA
@triciafoxxy @EricJGreenberg1 @davidminpdx Under some interpretations. And under current law. But who knows where the Alito Court’s creativity and shamelessness will lead to!

@cdanuloff Right. Can you explain why a finite supply of expensively generated tokens whose transactions are recorded on an irreversible, public ledger is a better store of value than legal tender?
@cdanuloff Explain it to me like I’m a five year old. Or like I’m old enough to remember both the invention of the World Wide Web, the dotcom crash, and that 2008 financial crisis.
@AkivaMCohen See, that’s the sort of attitude that lets the anti second amendment nuke control lobby run roughshod over our freedoms.
This one prevented a lot of Bitcoin heartbreak for those who applied it. https://t.co/S9B9ozvI6l
This is the past the Republican #RogueSCOTUS wants to return us to. https://t.co/eM0Q4zHFNY
Of course. https://t.co/JMGprMcicz

@realworldrj @RussOnPolitics @joshtpm Damn. North Jersey *deserves* three senators.
@realworldrj @RussOnPolitics @joshtpm Strongly considering sending him a check so I can create a Medium post, “Why I support Dr Oz and you should too” which lays out the case for a third North Jersey senator at length.

Who said there are no win-win scenarios in geopolitics? Seems like Bibi and the ayatollahs all got what they wanted. https://t.co/VLl85EuPe3
Though why Bibi wanted Iran to get nukes seems like something that deserves more investigation.
But that was the preordained result of the US pulling out of the JCPOA. This is another one of those “stupid, blinded by racism, or corrupt?” conversations we don’t have enough of.
Meanwhile, in the next district over, Gottheimer is fundraising on “Roe” and “choice” — but carefully not using the words “abortion” or “Republican.” https://t.co/a4m111Kswq
@shaifranklin Whoever is posting on the JNS twitter account needs to listen to more Ramones records. https://t.co/mxiqYlt7yK
@AvBronstein Hard to believe Jews don’t appreciate the man who effectively added “a country as innocent as OJ Simpson, Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump” to the hasbara lexicon.
Cancel culture cones for the neo-Nazi podcaster to county Republican Party FB page pipeline. https://t.co/43hyDCCXGJ
